description:
The only survivor of a massacre in a tower building of Tokyo. (Her name isn`t mentioned in the anime; Wikipedia suggests it might be "Alice".)
Actually she`s no human but a http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk] who has taken over the girl`s body (in order to free her comrades whose body fluids the Tokyo police intends to extract a drug named "Domull" from, giving them powers equal to those of a LH, with http://anidb.net/ch25725 [Aida] being one of the guinea pigs).
name: Otome
